Name: Charity/ Non-profit
Description: Privately held entities that do not provide financial benefits to their members or organizations; independent from any government.

Name: Federal
Description: National government organization (i.e., department, agency, crown corporation) that performs national level regulatory and administrative functions.

Name: Municipal
Description: Local governing body that provides services, facilities, safety, and infrastructure for communities.

Name: Private
Description: Organization, corporation, or partnership operated for profit that is not public or controlled by one or more public corporations.

Name: Provincial/ Territorial
Description: Regional government organization with jurisdiction over their specific regional boundaries.

Name: Other
Description: Ownership is known, but different than those defined in this table. This category includes private citizens.

Name: Unknown
Description: Ownership of the dam structure is unknown.
